culture: Raised in Ur of the Chaldees, Sumerian civilization. Polytheistic, ziggurats, moon god Nanna. Family: Terah (father), Sarai (wife), Lot (nephew).
journey: From Ur to Haran, then Canaan (Shechem, Bethel), Egypt (famine), Negev, Gerar, Hebron, Sodom rescue, Beer-sheba peace treaty.
archaeology: Ur excavated by Woolley (1920s): Royal tombs, ziggurat. Beer-sheba well: Tel Beer Sheva site, Iron Age well attributed to Abraham's time, still visible today in Israel. Canaan: Hazor, Megiddo sites show Bronze Age cities.
people: Melchizedek (king of Salem), Abimelech (king of Gerar), Hagar (Egyptian servant), Ishmael (son), Isaac (promised son).
